data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 2, Dong Jun Lee signals a Seongnam throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Dong Jun Lee signals a throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai, close to Seongnam's area.
In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kim Dong-hyeon (Seongnam) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 9, Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai.
Seongnam's Lee Tae-heui gets in a shot on goal at Tancheon Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Dong Jun Lee awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half?
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Seongnam to take a throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai territory.
In the minute 16, Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
In the minute 24, Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Important block from the Ulsan Hyundai defence as Kim Hyeon-seong fires in a strike for Seongnam.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Seongnam.
Ulsan Hyundai to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
In the minute 30, Junior Negrao (Ulsan Hyundai) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Dong Jun Lee awards Seongnam a goal kick.
Free kick Seongnam.
In the minute 31, Dong Jun Lee signals a Seongnam throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half.
Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 34, Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
Goal! Junior Negrao gives Ulsan Hyundai a 0-1 lead.
Hong Chul with an assist there.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
An attacking Ulsan Hyundai player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Junior Negrao nets and Ulsan Hyundai extend their lead to 0-2. The goal came from the penalty spot.
In the minute 41, Yeon Je-un for Seongnam has been booked by Dong Jun Lee and receives a first yellow card.
Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half?
Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 45, Dong Jun Lee will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Seongnam.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Seongnam.
Dong Jun Lee signals a Seongnam throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half.
Ulsan Hyundai to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
In the minute 47, Can Ulsan Hyundai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai close to the penalty box.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Seongnam.
In the minute 49, Kim Dong-hyeon for Seongnam gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Seongnam.
In the minute 51, Dong Jun Lee awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 52, Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Seongnam have been awarded a penalty...
Goal! Na Sangho nets a penalty for Seongnam. They now trail 1-2.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, The away team replace Park Jeong-in with Kim In-sung.
Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Ulsan Hyundai.
Dong Jun Lee signals a Ulsan Hyundai throw-in in Seongnam's half.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seongnam.
Seongnam's Park Su-il gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seongnam.
Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
In the minute 67, Ulsan Hyundai are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ulsan Hyundai make their second substitution with Lee Dong-kyeong replacing Kim Sung-joon.
In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Tomislav Kis is replacing Park Su-il for the home team.
Lee Dong-kyeong gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 70, Seongnam to take a throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai territory.
Throw-in Ulsan Hyundai.
Lee Dong-kyeong (Ulsan Hyundai) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 75, The home team have replaced Ahn Yeong-kyu with Lee Chang-yong. This is the second substitution made today by Nam Il Kim.
Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
In the minute 80, Free kick Ulsan Hyundai.
Im Seung-kyeom (Seongnam) has received a first yellow card.
Bjorn Johnsen is on a sub for Chung-Yong Lee for Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 82, In Seongnam Ulsan Hyundai drive forward through Yoon Bit-garam. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 84, Yang Dong-hyeon is on a sub for Park Tae-jun for Seongnam.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
In the minute 87, Dong Jun Lee awards the away team a throw-in.
Ulsan Hyundai's Kim In-sung gets in a shot on goal at Tancheon Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
Seongnam have a dangerous throw-in.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Ulsan Hyundai's Kim In-sung has run offside.
Can Seongnam capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ulsan Hyundai's half?
Dong Jun Lee awards Ulsan Hyundai a goal kick.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
